name: ai-finance-agency
description: AI-Powered Finance Agency Platform - Comprehensive Microservices Architecture

scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ]; then echo "Installing $service" && cd "$service" && npm install && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.build:services: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ]; then echo "Building $service" && cd "$service" && npm run build && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.lint:services: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ]; then echo "Linting $service" && cd "$service" && npm run lint && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.clean: npm run clean:coverage && npm run clean:node-modules
scripts.db:migrate: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ] && grep -q db:migrate "$service/package.json"; then echo "Migrating $service" && cd "$service" && npm run db:migrate && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.db:seed: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ] && grep -q db:seed "$service/package.json"; then echo "Seeding $service" && cd "$service" && npm run db:seed && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.security:audit: for service in services/*/; do if [ -f "$service/package.json" ]; then echo "Auditing $service" && cd "$service" && npm audit --audit-level=high && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.integration:quick: npm run check:service-status && npm run test:integration-available
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint:all && npm run test:unit

author: AI Finance Agency Team
